sportsNews.text: 🏆 District Champions - Our cricket team won the inter-school championship 2025!
⚽ Football Tournament - Secured 2nd position in regional football league.
🏃 Athletics Meet - 5 Gold medals in district athletics championship.

sportsNews.icon: <rect x="3" y="11" width="18" height="11" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><path d="M7 11V7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0v4"></path>
sportsNews.text: 🥇 Volleyball Victory - Won zonal volleyball tournament for 3rd consecutive year.

recentAchievements.title: District Cricket Championship
recentAchievements.description: Our cricket team dominated the district championship, defeating 12 schools to claim the trophy. Outstanding performance by captain Ahmed Ali who scored 450+ runs in the tournament.

recentAchievements.title: Regional Football League
recentAchievements.description: Secured 2nd position in the highly competitive regional football league. Team showed exceptional teamwork and sportsmanship throughout the season with 15 wins out of 18 matches.

recentAchievements.title: Athletics Championship Excellence
recentAchievements.description: Brought home 5 Gold, 3 Silver, and 2 Bronze medals from the district athletics meet. Set new records in 100m sprint and long jump categories.

recentAchievements.title: Volleyball Zonal Champions
recentAchievements.description: Third consecutive year winning the zonal volleyball championship. Our team's coordination and strategy proved unbeatable, winning all matches in straight sets.

recentAchievements.title: Basketball Tournament Runners-up
recentAchievements.description: Reached the finals of the inter-district basketball tournament. Despite being one of the youngest teams, we showcased tremendous potential and fighting spirit.

recentAchievements.title: Badminton Singles Championship
recentAchievements.description: Muhammad Bilal won the district badminton singles championship, defeating the defending champion in an thrilling final. First gold for GMHS in badminton in 5 years.
